byline.contributor: Tom Spousta contributed reporting from Arlington, Tex.

abstract: St Louis Cardinals first baseman Allen Craig joins Dusty Rhodes of the 1954 New York Giants as the only players with run-scoring pinch-hits in three straight games in a postseason; Craig is preparing with team for Game 3 of World Series against Texas Rangers.
snippet: Allen Craig has joined Dusty Rhodes of the 1954 Giants as the only players with run-scoring pinch-hits in three straight games in a postseason.
lead_paragraph: Allen Craig has joined Dusty Rhodes of the 1954 Giants as the only players with run-scoring pinch-hits in three straight games in a postseason.

headline.main: Postseason Pinch-Hit Star, Three Games Running
headline.print_headline: Postseason Pinch-Hit Star, Three Games Running
headline.seo: Cardinals’ Craig Ties a Postseason Pinch-Hitting Mark
